main_conferences.name: International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications
tracks: Large Language Models (LLMs) in the Metaverse

workshops.name: 1st International Workshop on Intelligent Digital Twins for Smart Cities in the Metaverse
1st International Workshop on BCI Interfaces & Cognitive Engineering in the Metaverse
1st International Workshop on Ethical AI & Secure Metaverse Ecosystems
1st International Workshop on Generative AI for Immersive Experience Design
1st International Workshop on AI-Enhanced Learning Worlds
1st International Workshop on Standards, Protocols, and AI Agents for a Unified Metaverse

submission_information: Manuscripts must be original, not previously published, or under review. Submissions should adhere to the IEEE Conference Proceedings Format, using a double-column layout, 10-point font, and letter-sized paper. Manuscripts must be submitted in PDF format and should not exceed 6 pages for the review process. Accepted papers may extend to a maximum of 8 pages for the camera-ready version, subject to an overlength page fee.
